geoConfig.siteName: Apple (中国大陆) - 官方网站

zh_CN.siteName: Apple (中国大陆) - 官方网站

notFound.headline: The page you’re looking for can’t be found.

storeSearch.searchPlaceholder: Search by location, ZIP, or store name
storeSearch.geolocationError: We can't determine your location. Try searching by city, store name, or ZIP code.

storeSearchResults.errorCopy: Please enter a location. We’ll show you the nearest Apple Store.

storeSummary.specialMessage: Health and safety measures may be in place based on local conditions. Questions about safety measures at our stores? See FAQs

spotlight.todaySubheading: Join free creative sessions happening every day.
spotlight.seeAllCTA: See all sessions at this store

seeMoreCTA.ariaLabel: See more Today at Apple sessions
seeMoreCTA.label: See more

tradeValues.ariaLabel: Apple Trade In Estimated Values Modal
tradeValues.headline: Get an estimate now. Get instant credit at the Apple Store.
tradeValues.copy: Trade in your eligible device at the Apple Store for instant credit toward your next purchase, or get an Apple Gift Card you can use anytime. If your device isn‘t eligible for credit, we‘ll recycle it for free.
tradeValues.noMacTradeHeadline: Looking to trade in a Mac?
tradeValues.noMacTradeCopy: You can’t do that at the Apple Store, but you can do it online.
tradeValues.otherProductsCopy: We believe every device has value. Although your device doesn't qualify for trade-in value, just send it to us and we'll recycle it for free.

prepareTradeAppointment.ariaLabel: Preparing for Apple Trade In Appointment Modal
prepareTradeAppointment.headline: How to prepare your device for trade‑in.
prepareTradeAppointment.copy: Save time by following these steps before you bring your device to the Apple Store.

tabs.name: iPhone or iPad
steps: Unpair all Apple Watch devices.
Back up your iPhone or iPad.
Sign out of iCloud, iTunes, and the App Store.
Do not erase your device. Once your device has been assessed, a Specialist will help you erase all of your content and settings.
tabs.furtherDetails: For more detailed instructions, visit the Apple Support page.

tabs.name: Mac
steps: Create a backup.
Sign out of iTunes on macOS Mojave or earlier.
Sign out of iCloud.
Sign out of iMessage.
If you’re keeping paired Bluetooth devices, unpair them (optional).
Erase your hard drive and reinstall macOS.
tabs.furtherDetails: For more detailed instructions, visit What to do before you sell, give away, or trade in your Mac

tabs.name: Apple Watch
steps: Keep your Apple Watch and iPhone close together.
Unpair your Apple Watch.
tabs.furtherDetails: For more detailed instructions, visit What to do before you sell, give away, or trade in your Apple Watch, or buy one from someone else

prepareGeniusAppointment.ariaLabel: Preparing for Genius Bar Appointment Modal
prepareGeniusAppointment.headline: How to prepare your device for a service appointment.
prepareGeniusAppointment.copy: To protect your information, like photos and contacts, as well as save time, follow these steps before you get service for your device. If your device won’t turn on or respond, finish as many steps as possible.

tabs.name: iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch
steps: Back up your device.
Bring your device and passwords.
tabs.furtherDetails: For more detailed instructions, visit Get your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch ready for service

tabs.name: Mac
steps: Back up your Mac.
Bring your Mac and passwords.
tabs.furtherDetails: For more detailed instructions, visit Get your Mac ready for service

tabs.name: Apple Watch
steps: Update your Apple Watch to the latest version of watchOS.
Update your iPhone to the latest version of iOS.
Back up your iPhone.
Make sure both your iPhone and Apple Watch are fully charged.
Bring your Apple Watch and iPhone.
tabs.furtherDetails: For more detailed instructions, visit Get your Apple Watch ready for service

emergencyMessage.message: FPO urgent message, lorem ipsum dolor sit

operatingModel.temporarilyClosedHeadline: This store is temporarily closed. Here’s what you can do online.
operatingModel.fullErrorMessage: Please try again later. You can also shop online or get support online.
operatingModel.onlineErrorMessage: Sorry, we’re having trouble displaying these services right now. Please visit our online store instead.
operatingModel.instoreErrorMessage: Sorry, we’re having trouble displaying these services right now. Please try again later.

head.title: Page Not Found - Apple
head.description: Apple info, Mac, iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and more. Find your way around apple.com.

head.title: Apple Store - Find a Store - Apple
head.description: Find an Apple Store and shop for Mac, iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and more. Sign up for Today at Apple programs. Or get support at the Genius Bar.

og.title: Apple Store - Find a Store - Apple
og.description: Find an Apple Store and shop for Mac, iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and more. Sign up for Today at Apple programs. Or get support at the Genius Bar.

head.title: Store List - Apple Store - Apple
head.description: Browse a list of every Apple Store throughout the world and view store hours, get directions, and more.

og.title: Apple Retail Store - Store List
og.description: Browse a list of every Apple Store throughout the world and view store hours, get directions, and more.

head.title: {{- storeName}} - Apple Store - Apple
head.description: Apple Store {{- storeName}} store hours, contact information, and weekly calendar of events.

og.title: {{- storeName}} - Apple Store - Apple
og.description: Apple Store {{- storeName}} store hours, contact information, and weekly calendar of events.

notFound.headline: 很抱歉，你要查找的网页找不到。
notFound.sitemapCTA: 或者查看我们的网站地图

storeHoursTable.specialHoursNotice: * 特殊营业时间。某些服务如 Genius Bar 天才吧在此期间可能暂停提供。

storeSearch.searchPlaceholder: 通过地点、邮政编码或店名进行搜索
storeSearch.geolocationError: 我们无法确定你的位置。请尝试通过所在城市、店名或邮政编码来搜索。

storeSearchResults.resultsNearYouHeading: 附近的 Apple Store 零售店
storeSearchResults.resultsNearLocationHeading: {{location}}附近的 Apple Store 零售店
storeSearchResults.errorCopy: 请输入地点。我们将为你查找最近的 Apple Store 零售店。
storeSearchResults.errorSeeAllStoresCTA: 查看全部 Apple Store 零售店

storeSummary.emailCTA: 发送电子邮件给这家门店

spotlight.todaySubheading: 欢迎参加日常开放的免费创意课程。
spotlight.seeAllCTA: 查看此零售店的全部课程

seeMoreCTA.ariaLabel: 进一步了解 Today at Apple 课程
seeMoreCTA.label: 进一步了解

tradeValues.ariaLabel: Apple Trade In 换购计划估算折抵金额模态框
tradeValues.eyebrow: Apple Trade In 换购计划
tradeValues.headline: 立即进行折抵估价，到 Apple Store 零售店即享换购优惠。
tradeValues.copy: 前往 Apple Store 零售店，用你符合条件的设备来换购，在选购新设备时即可享受折抵优惠。如果你的设备不符合折抵条件，我们会免费为你回收处理。
tradeValues.noMacTradeCopy: 目前 Apple Store 零售店不提供此项服务，请通过 Apple Store 在线商店折抵换购。
tradeValues.otherProductsHeadline: 你的设备，我们免费帮你回收处理。
tradeValues.otherProductsCopy: 我们相信，每部设备都是有价值的。虽然某些设备或许不符合折抵条件，但你也可将它交给我们，我们会免费为你回收处理。

prepareTradeAppointment.ariaLabel: 正在准备 Apple Trade In 换购计划预约模态框
prepareTradeAppointment.eyebrow: Apple Trade In 换购计划
prepareTradeAppointment.headline: 如何准备好设备，来折抵换购。
prepareTradeAppointment.copy: 在将设备带到 Apple Store 零售店进行折抵之前，按照下列步骤做好准备，可为你节省时间。

tabs.name: iPhone 或 iPad
steps: 取消与所有 Apple Watch 的配对。
备份你的 iPhone 或 iPad。
退出登录 iCloud、iTunes Store 与 App Store。
请不要抹掉你的设备。评估完成后，Specialist 专家会引导你抹掉设备上的所有内容和设置。
tabs.furtherDetails: 更多详细说明，请参阅 Apple 支持页面。

tabs.name: Mac
steps: 创建备份。
退出登录 iTunes。
退出登录 iCloud。
退出登录 iMessage 信息。
可选：取消配对要保留的蓝牙设备。
抹掉硬盘并重新安装 macOS。
tabs.furtherDetails: 更多详细说明，请参阅出售、赠送或折抵 Mac 前该怎么做

tabs.name: Apple Watch
steps: 将 Apple Watch 和 iPhone 放在一起。
取消配对 Apple Watch。
tabs.furtherDetails: 更多详细说明，请参阅在出售、赠送或折抵 Apple Watch，或从他人手中购买 Apple Watch 之前该怎么做页面

prepareGeniusAppointment.ariaLabel: 正在准备 Genius Bar 天才吧预约模态框
prepareGeniusAppointment.headline: 如何准备好设备，来预约店内服务。
prepareGeniusAppointment.copy: 为了保护你的照片和通讯录等信息并节约时间，在为你的设备获取维修服务之前，请先按照以下步骤操作。如果你的设备无法开机或者没有响应，请尽可能多地完成这些步骤。

tabs.name: iPhone、iPad 或 iPod touch
steps: 备份你的设备。
请带上你的设备与密码。
tabs.furtherDetails: 更多详细说明，请参阅 iPhone、iPad 或 iPod touch 维修前的准备工作页面

tabs.name: Mac
steps: 备份你的 Mac。
请带上你的 Mac 与密码。
tabs.furtherDetails: 更多详细说明，请参阅 Mac 维修前的准备工作页面

tabs.name: Apple Watch
steps: 更新 Apple Watch 至最新版本的 watchOS。
更新 iPhone 至最新版本的 iOS。
备份你的 iPhone。
确保 iPhone 和 Apple Watch 充满电。
请带上你的 Apple Watch 与 iPhone。
tabs.furtherDetails: 更多详细说明，请参阅 Apple Watch 维修前的准备工作页面

operatingModel.ariaLabel: 零售店服务项弹出窗口
operatingModel.temporarilyClosedHeadline: 该零售店目前暂停营业。以下是我们提供的在线服务。
operatingModel.fullErrorMessage: 请稍后再试。你也可在线选购或获取支持。
operatingModel.onlineErrorMessage: 抱歉，这些服务目前无法显示。请访问我们的在线商店。
operatingModel.instoreErrorMessage: 抱歉，这些服务目前无法显示。请稍后再试。
